price: 92. cuando no es propio (de Su grandeza) tomar un hijo para Sí.
arabic: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِي لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā yanbaghī lilrraḥmāni an yattakhidha waladan
